name: Analyse des ventes en temps r√©el avec Bright Data, OpenAI et Google Sheets
description:
*Ce flux de travail contient des n≈ìuds communautaires qui ne sont compatibles qu'avec la version auto-h√©berg√©e de n8n.*

Ce flux de travail suit automatiquement les indicateurs cl√©s du pipeline de ventes : nouveaux prospects, √©tapes des affaires, taux de r√©ussite, et envoie des informations exploitables √† votre √©quipe. √âliminez les exports manuels de CRM et restez au fait de la sant√© des revenus.

## Aper√ßu

L'automatisation interroge votre API CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce ou Pipedrive) selon un calendrier, extrait les donn√©es du pipeline et les transmet √† OpenAI pour la d√©tection d'anomalies (par exemple, des affaires bloqu√©es). Des r√©sum√©s et des alertes apparaissent dans Slack, tandis que des instantan√©s quotidiens sont archiv√©s dans Google Sheets pour l'analyse des tendances.

## Outils Utilis√©s

- **n8n** ‚Äì Orchestration de pipeline
- **API CRM** ‚Äì Se connecte √† votre CRM choisi
- **OpenAI** ‚Äì D√©tecte les anomalies et met en √©vidence les risques
- **Slack** ‚Äì Notifie les repr√©sentants et les managers en temps r√©el
- **Google Sheets** ‚Äì Stocke les donn√©es historiques du pipeline

## Comment Installer

1. **Importer le Flux de Travail** dans n8n.
2. **Connecter Votre CRM** : Fournissez les identifiants API dans le n≈ìud de requ√™te HTTP.
3. **Configurer OpenAI** : Ajoutez votre cl√© API.
4. **Autoriser Slack & Google Sheets**.
5. **Personnaliser les Seuils** : Ajustez ce qui constitue une affaire bloqu√©e ou une faible conversion.

## Cas d'Utilisation

- **Gestion des Ventes** : Surveillez la sant√© du pipeline sans tableaux de bord.
- **Op√©rations de Revenus** : D√©tectez les goulets d'√©tranglement t√¥t.
- **Pr√©visions** : Utilisez des instantan√©s historiques pour am√©liorer les pr√©dictions.
- **Coaching des Repr√©sentants** : Alertez les repr√©sentants lorsque les affaires stagnent.

## Connectez-vous avec Moi

- **Site Web** : https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube** : https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn** : https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Obtenez Bright Data** : https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Utiliser ce lien soutient mes flux de travail gratuits avec une petite commission)

#n8n #automatisation #pipelineventes #crm #openai #alertsslack #fluxn8n #nocode #operationsrevenus

parameters.text:
=You are a data analyst connected to Bright Data MCP scraping tool.

Scrape CRM-like sales data from this public API:
{{ $json.URL }}

Treat each user as a sales lead. For each entry, extract and simulate the following fields:

{
"leadId": <use id>,
"rep": <use name>,
"stage": <use username as deal stage>,
"value": <convert address.zipcode to number and use as deal value>,
"status": <use company.name to randomly assign status as "open", "won", or "lost">
}

Then:

Calculate total number of leads

Total value of pipeline

Count of leads in each stage

Count of deals by status: open, won, lost

Identify top 3 reps based on simulated deal value

parameters.content:
# üöÄ Smart CRM Scraper & Pipeline Health Analyzer (n8n + Bright Data + Google Sheets)

This automation workflow is perfect for sales ops, marketers, analysts, or even founders who want to:

* üì• Scrape sales pipeline data from CRM dashboards
* üìä Get insights into reps, leads, and statuses
* üìÅ Store it all in Google Sheets automatically ‚Äî no copy/paste, no coding

Let‚Äôs break this into 3 simple sections üëá

---

üî∑‚ÄÇSECTION 1: Start & Set Target
üß© Combines these nodes:

* ‚ö° Trigger: Start CRM Scraper
* üîó Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?
This section is where your automation begins. You:

1. Manually run the workflow by clicking ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù
2. Define the website or CRM source you want to scrape

Example:

* You paste a mock CRM URL (e.g. [https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com](https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com)) ‚Äî but in a real scenario, it could be a Bright Data-accessible CRM dashboard.

‚ú® Benefits for Beginners:
‚úÖ No coding ‚Äî just click + paste a URL
‚úÖ Easily swap out URLs for different CRM dashboards
‚úÖ Full control over when scraping starts

üéØ Icons Summary:
‚ö° Manual Start | üîó Source URL Setup

üí° Real-World Use:
Replace the URL with a live CRM performance dashboard hosted inside Bright Data‚Äôs mobile proxy network.

---

ü§ñ‚ÄÇSECTION 2: AI Agent ‚Äî Scrape + Analyze
üß© Combines:

* ü§ñ Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

  * üß† AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)
  * üåê Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown)
  * üßæ Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?

This is the ‚Äúthinking‚Äù part of the workflow.

1. üß† AI Brain: OpenAI understands the task. It generates instructions like:
   ‚ÄÉ‚ÄúScrape rep names, stages, leads, health from this CRM dashboard as markdown.‚Äù

2. üåê Bright Data Tool: The MCP tool accesses the page invisibly (like a phone browser) and extracts pipeline data using its scrape\_as\_markdown tool.

3. üßæ Structured Output Parser: Converts the scraped messy text into a structured JSON format like this:

```json
[
  {
    "rep": "Alice",
    "leads": 22,
    "stage": "Proposal",
    "status": "At Risk"
  },
  ...
]
```

‚ú® Benefits for Beginners:
‚úÖ Zero scraping code
‚úÖ Handles login-blocked or bot-protected CRMs via mobile proxies
‚úÖ Clean data format ‚Äî easy to use in Sheets or dashboards

üéØ Icons Summary:
üß† OpenAI Logic | üåê Bright Data Scraper | üßæ JSON Cleaner

üí° Real-World Use:
Scrape weekly CRM dashboards from tools like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce (if routed via Bright Data), and turn them into structured performance data.

---

üü®‚ÄÇSECTION 3: Format & Store to Google Sheets
üß© Combines:

* üß© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows
* üìä Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?

1. üß© Split JSON: This node breaks the final structured output into individual items (one per sales rep), so each one becomes a row in your spreadsheet.

2. üìä Google Sheet Node: Adds each row into a connected Google Sheet ‚Äî storing columns like:

| rep   | leads | stage     | status  |
| ----- | ----- | --------- | ------- |
| Alice | 22    | Proposal  | At Risk |
| Bob   | 17    | Qualified | Healthy |

‚ú® Benefits for Beginners:
‚úÖ Saves all CRM data automatically ‚Äî no manual data entry
‚úÖ Compatible with Google Data Studio / Looker / Excel
‚úÖ Great for sharing with managers or teams

üéØ Icons Summary:
üß© JSON Splitter | üìä Sheet Writer

üí° Real-World Use:
Use it for live pipeline visibility. Sync Sheets with dashboards or reporting tools, or use for daily monitoring via automations.

---

üì¶ Final Summary Table

| Step       | Node Name                                 | Purpose                                      |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| 1Ô∏è‚É£ Input  | ‚ö° Trigger: Start CRM Scraper              | Manually trigger the workflow                |
|            | üîó Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)   | Define where to scrape the CRM data from     |
| 2Ô∏è‚É£ Agent  | ü§ñ Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)  | Smart agent to analyze CRM                   |
|            | üß† AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)         | Creates scrape instructions                  |
|            | üåê Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown) | Executes scrape via MCP mobile network       |
|            | üßæ Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)   | Converts scrape results into structured data |
| 3Ô∏è‚É£ Output | üß© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows           | Breaks each record into its own row          |
|            | üìä Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)      | Saves data into Google Sheet row-by-row      |

ü§ñ‚ÄÇSECTION 2: AI Agent ‚Äî Scrape + Analyze
üß© Combines:

* ü§ñ Monitor Sales Pipeline (CRM AI Agent)

  * üß† AI Brain (CRM Query Generator)
  * üåê Bright Data MCP (scrape\_as\_markdown)
  * üßæ Clean JSON Parser (Pipeline Metrics)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?

This is the ‚Äúthinking‚Äù part of the workflow.

1. üß† AI Brain: OpenAI understands the task. It generates instructions like:
   ‚ÄÉ‚ÄúScrape rep names, stages, leads, health from this CRM dashboard as markdown.‚Äù

2. üåê Bright Data Tool: The MCP tool accesses the page invisibly (like a phone browser) and extracts pipeline data using its scrape\_as\_markdown tool.

3. üßæ Structured Output Parser: Converts the scraped messy text into a structured JSON format like this:

```json
[
  {
    "rep": "Alice",
    "leads": 22,
    "stage": "Proposal",
    "status": "At Risk"
  },
  ...
]
```

‚úÖ Clean data format ‚Äî easy to use in Sheets or dashboards

üí° Real-World Use:
Scrape weekly CRM dashboards from tools like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce (if routed via Bright Data), and turn them into structured performance data.

üü®‚ÄÇSECTION 3: Format & Store to Google Sheets
üß© Combines:

* üß© Split Metrics for Sheet Rows
* üìä Store CRM Insights (Google Sheet)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?

1. üß© Split JSON: This node breaks the final structured output into individual items (one per sales rep), so each one becomes a row in your spreadsheet.

2. üìä Google Sheet Node: Adds each row into a connected Google Sheet ‚Äî storing columns like:

| rep   | leads | stage     | status  |
| ----- | ----- | --------- | ------- |
| Alice | 22    | Proposal  | At Risk |
| Bob   | 17    | Qualified | Healthy |

üí° Real-World Use:
Use it for live pipeline visibility. Sync Sheets with dashboards or reporting tools, or use for daily monitoring via automations.

üî∑‚ÄÇSECTION 1: Start & Set Target
üß© Combines these nodes:

* ‚ö° Trigger: Start CRM Scraper
* üîó Set Source URL (CRM/JSONPlaceholder)

üìå‚ÄÇWhat Happens Here?
This section is where your automation begins. You:

1. Manually run the workflow by clicking ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù
2. Define the website or CRM source you want to scrape

Example:

* You paste a mock CRM URL (e.g. [https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com](https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com)) ‚Äî but in a real scenario, it could be a Bright Data-accessible CRM dashboard.

‚ú® Benefits for Beginners:
‚úÖ No coding ‚Äî just click + paste a URL

üéØ Icons Summary:

üí° Real-World Use:
Replace the URL with a live CRM performance dashboard hosted inside Bright Data‚Äôs mobile proxy network.
